snippet: The United States won the women’s under-20 World Cup for the third time, defeating the defending champion, Germany, 1-0, in Tokyo on a goal by Kealia Ohai in the 44th minute.
abstract: United States women’s soccer team wins the under-20 World Cup for the third time, defeating the defending champion Germany, 1-0; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: The United States won the women’s under-20 World Cup for the third time, defeating the defending champion, Germany, 1-0, in Tokyo on a goal by Kealia Ohai in the 44th minute.

headline.seo: U.S. Women Beat Germany to Win Under-20 World Cup
headline.main: U.S. Women Win U-20 World Cup
